import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { productListReducer } from '../reducers/productReducers'; import { listProducts } from '../actions/productActions'; import {Rating} from '../components/Rating' import data from '../data.js' import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; function AllProductScreen(props){ //const [products,setProduct] = useState([]); const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList); const{products,loading,error} = productList; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProducts()); return() => { } },[]) return loading ?
: error ?
